org.drip.analytics.output

Class BondCouponMeasures

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
      • org.drip.analytics.output.BondCouponMeasures

  • public class BondCouponMeasures
extends Serializer
    This class encapsulates the parsimonius but complete set of the cash-flow oriented coupon measures generated out of a full bond analytics run to a given work-out.

        Parameters:
        dblAccrued01 - Accrued 01
